org.activebpel.rt.bpel.coord
Interface IAeCoordinating

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeCoordinator, IAeParticipant, IAeSpCoordinating, IAeSpCoordinator, IAeSpParticipant
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeCoordinatingBase, AeSpCoordinator, AeSpParticipant
public interface IAeCoordinating

Defines an activity that is either the coordinator or the participant (coordinatable).

Field Summary
static java.lang.String AE_COORD_LOCATION_PATH
          Process's (coordinator or participant)activity location path.

          Coordination Id (context id)

          Coordinator-participant protocol.
static java.lang.String WSCOORD_TYPE
          Coordination type to use.

onProcessComplete

public void onProcessComplete(IAeFault aFaultObject,
                              boolean aNormalCompletion)
Notification via the process manager when a process has completed.

Parameters:
aFaultObject - fault, if process completed with a fault; or null otherwise.
aNormalCompletion - indicates process completed normally and is eligible for compensation.
